description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Prawn Singapore Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Prawn Singapore Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the noodle mixture among 4 warm, shallow bowls, sprinkle with the chiles, and serve with lime wedges.
